publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-2729# Lord James Douglas-Hamilton: Commonwealth Day 2002-That the Parliament recognises the valuable role of the Commonwealth in building relationships between nations across the world; welcomes the continued contribution of Scotland and its people to those relationships, and reaffirms its support for the work of the Commonwealth Parliamentary Association.

S1M-2729# Lord James Douglas-Hamilton: Commonwealth Day 2002â€”That the Parliament recognises the valuable role of the Commonwealth in building relationships between nations across the world; welcomes the continued contribution of Scotland and its people to those relationships, and reaffirms its support for the work of the Commonwealth Parliamentary Association. Supported by: Trish Godman*, Mr Keith Harding*, Mr Keith Raffan*, Brian Adam*
S1M-2729# Commonwealth Day 2002 (lodged on 12 February 2002) Nora Radcliffe*
S1M-2729# Commonwealth Day 2002 (lodged on 12 February 2002) Mr Duncan Hamilton*, Donald Gorrie*
S1M-2729# Commonwealth Day 2002 (lodged on 12 February 2002) Mr Kenneth Macintosh*, Karen Gillon*

S1M-2729# Commonwealth Day 2002 (lodged on 12 February 2002) Robin Harper*
S1M-2729# Commonwealth Day 2002 (lodged on 12 February 2002) Phil Gallie*
S1M-2729# Commonwealth Day 2002 (lodged on 12 February 2002) Karen Whitefield*, Robert Brown*
S1M-2729# Commonwealth Day 2002 (lodged on 12 February 2002) John Scott*
